remarks: The equality of two translations is determined by their equality at atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2014.)
statement:
ltrneq2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrneq2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrneq2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrneq2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( A. p e. A ( F ` p ) = ( G ` p ) <-> F = G ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d F p $.
$d G p $.
